title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart sets forth minimum construction and
physical environment standards applicable to: (a) nursing home facilities built and to
portions of nursing home facilities altered or renovated pursuant to department
or commissioner approval granted between July 2, 1990 and December 31, 2010; and
(b) other nursing home facility
construction that does not require commissioner or department approval and is
completed prior to December 31, 2010. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
713-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
